title: Fix toChildArray missing from React compat shim
description: The React build fails in admin Docker because toChildArray (a Preact function) is imported from 'preact' in frontend/src/headless/utils/slot.tsx but the react-compat-shim.js doesn't export it. Fix: Add 'export const toChildArray = (children) => React.Children.toArray(children).filter(Boolean);' to frontend/src/shims/react-compat-shim.js, then rebuild and republish to yalc.

title: Test beads integration
description: Verify beads is working correctly with the importcsv project

title: Fix broken migration c734150f184e - token_blacklist doesn't exist
description: Migration c734150f184e_add_key_to_importer.py fails because it tries to drop index ix_token_blacklist_token_id and table token_blacklist which don't exist. Fix: Make the drop operations conditional with IF EXISTS checks.
